name: Lillia vs The Plague
description:
The evil witch Plague is trying to destroy the world -- It's up to you to stop her!

Play as the good witch Lillia as she fights her way through Plague's domain, assisted by Lillia's familiar, Mortis.

Charge up your power and use deadly combos to carve your way through the enemies!

Can you help Lillia defeat Plague and save the world?
